meanings.sent1: My grandparents have been married for two semicentennials.
meanings.sent2: The library's collection includes books from several semicentennials ago.
meanings.sent3: The tree in our backyard has witnessed two semicentennials of changing seasons.
meanings.sent4: The ancient ruins stood as a testament to the semicentennials that had passed.
meanings.sent5: The historian studied the semicentennials of the empire's rise and fall.

meanings.definition: A celebration or event marking fifty years.
meanings.sent1: The town organized a parade to commemorate the semicentennials of its founding.
meanings.sent2: The semicentennials of the school were marked with a special alumni reunion.
meanings.sent3: The cake for the semicentennials party was so big, it barely fit through the door!
meanings.sent4: The fireworks lit up the sky in honor of the semicentennials celebration.
meanings.sent5: The semicentennials event brought together generations of families in joyous celebration.
